summary: Arrow Crafting is a small mod I made for myself while learning the Creation Kit for Skyrim...
descriptionHtml:
---Arrow Crafting v1.0---

Arrow Crafting is a small mod I made for myself while learning the Creation Kit for Skyrim. I am aware that there are several different mods like this, but I will upload this mod anyway because I want my mods to get out there, so people can give me constructive criticism.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YTccT8Trc40

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All the arrows are currently located under the \\\\\\\"Misc\\\\\\\" tab in Blacksmith Forges, and each type of arrow has a perk requirement. The same as armours have.

Got any pointers? Feel free to leave a comment!
author: Kuddie
